name: Factor Funding Co.
tag_list: accounts-receivable-funding, invoice-factoring, factoring, asset-based-loans, commercial-capital, business-funding, equipment-finance--buyback, purchase-order-funding
overview:
Factor Funding Company is a nationwide business funding services provider. We are increasingly taking the lead in providing cash flow solutions to small businesses across the U.S. Our core business is providing invoice financing to improve cash flow and enable businesses to operate in a more effective and efficient manner.

Factor Funding Company was first established in 1996 to provide accounts receivable funding (factoring) services to businesses in Houston, Texas and surrounding areas. Over the past ten years, we have grown beyond our local market and expanded our services nationwide to include: Purchase Order (P.O), equipment, asset based, contract, collection, annuity, settlement, lawsuit, and real estate funding.
